item.title: We should learn to embrace mediocrity
item.description: Date: 08052021 Tags: #in-progress/garden #projects Relevant Notes 202108031836 Grounding Why? To break the construct that we should work our ass off in order to achieve societal acceptance To break the social construct that settling is incorrect To impart the concept the it’s okay to be mediocre To advocate for prioritizing health over outward sense-seeking How?
